name: SVGGraphicsElement
description: The SVGGraphicsElement interface represents SVG elements whose primary purpose is to directly render graphics into a group.

members.name: SVGGraphicsElement.transform
members.description: AnÂ SVGAnimatedTransformList reflecting the computed value of the transform property and its corresponding transform attribute of the given element.

members.name: SVGGraphicsElement.getBBox()
members.description: Returns a DOMRect representing the computed bounding box of the current element.

members.name: SVGGraphicsElement.getCTM()
members.description: Returns a DOMMatrix representing the matrix that transforms the current element's coordinate system to its SVG viewport's coordinate system.

members.name: SVGGraphicsElement.getScreenCTM()
members.description: Returns a DOMMatrix representing the matrix that transforms the current element's coordinate system to the coordinate system of the SVG viewport for the SVG document fragment.
